type: Legendary Creature – Dragon Shapeshifter Lord Noble
rules_text:
Trample, menace
[i]Dragon Vein[/i] – When Corrin, Crux of Fate enters, choose one –
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
• You gain 2 life for each creature you control, then untap each creature you control.
[i]Dreadful Aura[/i] – Creatures you don't control get -1/-1.
